author: ghudson
msg: In the dumper and loader code, eliminate a bunch of nullity checks for
streams, including the feedback streams.  If a feedback stream is
NULL, replace it with an empty stream.
(svn_repos_get_fs_build_parser): If outstream is NULL, use an empty
(svn_repos_dump_fs2): If feedback_stream is NULL, use an empty

author: ghudson
msg: Fix a cosmetic issue introduced by r10508.

author: ghudson
msg: Minimal patch to make "svn verify" check file contents, for
output stream is provided, create an empty stream.  This leaves
behind a bunch of now-useless checks for the nullity of the output
stream, which will be cleaned up in a future commit.

author: ghudson
msg: In FSFS, perform checksumming when reading a representation.
(rep_read_baton_t): Add checksum_finalized, checksum, len, and off
(rep_read_contents): Replace with a wrapper around get_contents,
